    • fetchChatsFromBackend

      public void fetchChatsFromBackend(android.content.Context context, int userId, ChatManager.ChatFetchCallback callback)
      Fetches chat messages from the backend for a specific user. Backend endpoint: GET SERVER_URL/chat/{userId} Response format: [{"groupId": "string", "content": "string", "senderUserId": int}, ...]
      Parameters:
      context - Application context for Volley requests
      userId - The user ID to fetch chats for
      callback - Callback to handle the fetched messages

    • fetchChatGroups

      public void fetchChatGroups(android.content.Context context, ChatManager.ChatGroupsCallback callback)
      Fetches all chat groups the user is part of from the backend. GET /chat/groups -> [{id, professionalIds, studentIds, groupName, messageIds, createdOn}, ...]
      Parameters:
      context - Application context for Volley requests
      callback - Callback to handle the fetched groups

    • updateChatGroup

      public void updateChatGroup(android.content.Context context, String groupId, List<Integer> professionalIds, List<Integer> studentIds, String groupName, ChatManager.ChatGroupUpdateCallback callback)
      Updates a chat group. PUT /chat/groups/{id} {professionalIds, studentIds, groupName} -> {id, professionalIds, studentIds, groupName, messageIds, createdOn}
      Parameters:
      context - Application context for Volley requests
      groupId - The ID of the group to update
      professionalIds - List of professional IDs
      studentIds - List of student IDs
      groupName - The group name
      callback - Callback to handle the response

    • deleteChatGroup

      public void deleteChatGroup(android.content.Context context, String groupId, ChatManager.ChatGroupDeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes a chat group. DELETE /chat/groups/{id} -> 200
      Parameters:
      context - Application context for Volley requests
      groupId - The ID of the group to delete
      callback - Callback to handle the response
